column1: * 1939 - J.R.R. Tolkien does the third and final day of his training with the top-secret Government Code and Cypher School (GCCS) at their London headquarters.
* 1981 - The fourth episode of the The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
* 2000 - Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue Tyalië Tyelelliéva 14 is published.
** Gandalf leaves Mirkwood for the Shire.
